smoothies.name: Strawbana
smoothies.description: This smoothie is a delicious combination of strawberry and banana!

smoothies.name: Fresh Greens
smoothies.description: This smoothie is flavored with mouth-watering guava and kiwi. It is a must try!

smoothies.name: Blue Razz
